STOP is the name of a song written by the American singer-songwriter and musician Prince. The song was released twice at different times. The first version of the song was released as a non-album single by Warner Bros. Records on February 10, 1989. The second version was included as the twelfth and final track on Prince's thirteenth album Graffiti Bridge, released on August 21, 1990.
